method.name: POST
method.doc: To install a fix pack with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the fix packs URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: file
param.doc: The name of the fixpack to install

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
